description: Farm With Fred is an innovative initiative led by Fred Monene, a Kenyan farmer and agronomist, aimed at transforming agricultural practices across Africa. Through social media, Fred shares his expertise in sustainable farming, connecting with farmers globally to promote good practices and food security. The initiative not only educates farmers but also fosters a community focused on improving agricultural productivity and environmental stewardship, ultimately striving for a healthier and more prosperous future for all.
name: Farm With Fred
